snippet: Alek Skarlatos, Spencer Stone and Anthony Sadler received official thanks at the White House and the Pentagon for their role in foiling a terrorist attack in France last month.
abstract: Oregon National Guard Specialist Alek Skarlatos is celebrated at Pentagon and White House for foiling terrorist attack in France in August; meets with Pres Obama, accompanied by two childhood friends, Airman First Class Spencer Stone and Anthony Sadler, who were also honored for their heroism.
lead_paragraph: Alek Skarlatos, Spencer Stone and Anthony Sadler received official thanks at the White House and the Pentagon for their role in foiling a terrorist attack in France last month.

headline.main: A Hero’s Welcome at the White House
headline.print_headline: A Hero’s Welcome at the White House
